buildup.text: DeFi stands for Decentralized Finance. It recreates banking services using smart contracts.

discovery.text: Lend your crypto and earn interest. Borrow against your holdings. All peer-to-peer, no middleman.

twist.text: Some DeFi protocols offer 10x higher interest than banks. But higher reward means higher risk.

climax.text: Anyone with internet can access DeFi. No credit checks. No bank accounts. Just a wallet.

punchline.text: DeFi: financial freedom, one smart contract at a time.
